name: Oh So Hero!
summary: Oh So Hero! is a lewd metroidvania game in development by Full Frontal Frog! Play as the dragonesque hero Joe to fight and fornicate with enemies, build intimate relationships with anthropomorphic characters, and embark on a sex-filled adventure to win the mysterious alien Gerrabacco tournament being held on Joe's island!
